::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: FM1.2.web.map v1.0.


> Marine ecoregions (Spalding et al. 2008) containing major or minor occurrences of each ecosystem functional group were identified by consulting global and regional reviews, maps of relevant ecosystems, imagery available in Google Earth and expertise of authors. Occurrences were converted to 30 arc second spatial resolution and clipped to a 20 km buffer along the coastline to exlcude inland and offshore areas of the ecoregions..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- Mapbox tileset ([GeoTIFF version uploaded to Mapbox](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.FM1_2_web_map))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091015))
 - Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**FM1.2 Permanently open riverine estuaries and bays**](/efg-info/FM1_2.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Indicative Map (**code: FM1.2.IM.orig**, version v2.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: FM1.2.web.map**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

FM1.2.IM.orig (v2.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/FM1.2.IM.orig_v2.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934)
FM1.2.web.map (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [GitHub repository](FM1.2.web.map_v1.0_topo.json) :: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/FM1.2.web.map_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091015) :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.FM1_2_web_map) :: [GitHub repository](layers/FM1.2.web.map_v1.0_topo.json) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
